is event which is generated when a contribution voting has came to an end and the contribution is accepted","params":{"contributionId":"This is the id of the contribution to which the record is related to","recordId":"This is the id of the record to which this contribution relates to","rewardCommunity":"The reward amount for community tokens","rewardGovernance":"The reward amount for governance tokens","to":"This the address of the winner or the owner of the contribution"}},"NewTokenCreated(uint256,string,string,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint8)":{"details":"this is event which is created when new governance token is created (NEW CREATION Not MINTING)","params":{"creationDate":"This is the creation date of the token","image":"This is the image of the token","recordId":"This is the record Id to which this token belongs to","symbol":"This is the symbol of the governance token","tokenAmount":"This is the amount of token that are created","tokenId":"This is the id of token that is newly created tokens","tokenType":"This is the type of the token that is created => For governance 1 and for copyright 0"}},"TokenMinted(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"this is event which is created when new governance token is minted after the voting is done","params":{"creationDate":"This is the creation date of the token","recordId":"This is the record Id to which this token belongs to","tokenAmount":"This is the amount of token that are created","tokenId":"This is the id of token that is newly created tokens"}},"TokenTransfer(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256,string)":{"details":"this is event which is created when a token transfer takes place","params":{"amount":"This is the amount of token transferred","from":"This is the address of sender","symbol":"This is the symbol of the token that were transferred","to":"This is the address of receiver","tokenId":"This is the id of the token that is being transferred","transferDate":"This is the date of the transfer"}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOf(address,uint256)":{"details":"this function is responsible to return the balance of a token Here it has been overridden so that any request for CRD token will be redirected to the ERC20 contract of CRD token","params":{"account":"this is the address of the user whose balance you want to check","id":"this is the id of the token that is to be transferred"},"returns":{"_0":"balance This is the balance of the user"}},"balanceOfAt(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves the balance of `account` at the time `snapshotId` was created."},"balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[])":{"details":"See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length."},"createNewCommunityToken((uint256,uint256,uint256,string,string),address)":{"details":"This function creates new community tokens for specified record","params":{"newTokenData":"This contains all the parameters needed to create a new community token that are","userAddress":"- This is the address of the user who is the creator of the token"}},"createNewGovernanceToken((uint256,uint256,uint256,string,string),address)":{"details":"This function creates new governance tokens for specified record","params":{"newTokenData":"This contains all the parameters needed to create a new governance token that are","userAddress":"- This is the address of the user who is the creator of the token"}},"exists(uint256)":{"details":"Indicates whether any token exist with a given id, or not."},"initialize(address,address,address,address)":{"details":"This is to set the address of the contracts","params":{"controllerContractAddress":"This is the address of Controller contract","crdTokenAddress":"This is the address of CRD token contract","newTreasuryAddress":"This is the address of new voting hub contract","newVotingHubContract":"This is the address of new voting hub contract"}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-isApprovedForAll}."},"isSymbolAvailable(string,string)":{"details":"This function checks if symbol are available or not","params":{"communitySymbol":"Symbol for community token","governanceSymbol":"Symbol for governance token"}},"mintTokens(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function creats new community tokens for specified record","params":{"recordId":"This is the id of the record to which the token belongs to","tokenAmount":"This is the amount that is to be minted","tokenId":"This is the id of the which is to be minted"}},"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","ids":"An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)","operator":"The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","values":"An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).","params":{"data":"Additional data with no specified format","from":"The address which previously owned the token","id":"The ID of the token being transferred","operator":"The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)","value":"The amount of tokens being transferred"},"returns":{"_0":"`bytes4(keccak256(\"onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)\"))` if transfer is allowed"}},"safeBatchTransferFrom(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeBatchTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC1155-setApprovalForAll}."},"setSymbolsAsAvailable(string,string)":{"params":{"communitySymbol":"Symbol for community token","governanceSymbol":"Symbol for governance token"}},"setSymbolsAsUsed(string,string)":{"params":{"communitySymbol":"Symbol for community token","governanceSymbol":"Symbol for governance token"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"totalSupply(uint256)":{"details":"Total amount of tokens in with a given id."},"totalSupplyAt(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Retrieves the total supply at the time `snapshotId` was created."},"transferRewardAmount(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"This function is called only by the voting contract once the voting ends","params":{"contributionId":"this is the contribution id to which the user has won","recordId":"This is the recordId to which the contribution belongs to","rewardCommunity":"this is the amount of community token that needs to be transferred","rewardGovernance":"this is the amount of Governance token that needs to be transferred","to":"This is the receivers address"}},"transferRewardTokens(uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"this function is responsible for minting of new tokens for records","params":{"amount":"the amount that is to be This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\\{id\\}` substring with the actual token type documentation.text:
@param governanceSymbol Symbol for governance token
 @param communitySymbol Symbol for community token

@param governanceSymbol Symbol for governance token
 @param communitySymbol Symbol for community token

ContributionRewardTransferred(address,ui.details: this is event which is generated when a contribution voting has came to an end and the contribution is accepted

params.contributionId: This is the id of the contribution to which the record is related to
params.recordId: This is the id of the record to which this contribution relates to
params.rewardCommunity: The reward amount for community tokens
params.rewardGovernance: The reward amount for governance tokens
params.to: This the address of the winner or the owner of the contribution

NewTokenCreated(uint256,string,string,ui.details: this is event which is created when new governance token is created (NEW CREATION Not MINTING)

params.creationDate: This is the creation date of the token
params.image: This is the image of the token
params.recordId: This is the record Id to which this token belongs to
params.symbol: This is the symbol of the governance token
params.tokenAmount: This is the amount of token that are created
params.tokenId: This is the id of token that is newly created tokens
params.tokenType: This is the type of the token that is created => For governance 1 and for copyright 0

TokenMinted(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint.details: this is event which is created when new governance token is minted after the voting is done

params.creationDate: This is the creation date of the token
params.recordId: This is the record Id to which this token belongs to
params.tokenAmount: This is the amount of token that are created
params.tokenId: This is the id of token that is newly created tokens

TokenTransfer(address,address,uint256,ui.details: this is event which is created when a token transfer takes place

params.amount: This is the amount of token transferred
params.from: This is the address of sender
params.symbol: This is the symbol of the token that were transferred
params.to: This is the address of receiver
params.tokenId: This is the id of the token that is being transferred
params.transferDate: This is the date of the transfer

balanceOf(address,uint256).details: this function is responsible to return the balance of a token Here it has been overridden so that any request for CRD token will be redirected to the ERC20 contract of CRD token

params.account: this is the address of the user whose balance you want to check
params.id: this is the id of the token that is to be transferred

returns._0: balance This is the balance of the user

balanceOfAt(address,uint256,uint256).details: Retrieves the balance of `account` at the time `snapshotId` was created.

balanceOfBatch(address[],uint256[]).details: See {IERC1155-balanceOfBatch}. Requirements: - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.

createNewCommunityToken((uint256,uint256.details: This function creates new community tokens for specified record

params.newTokenData: This contains all the parameters needed to create a new community token that are
params.userAddress: - This is the address of the user who is the creator of the token

createNewGovernanceToken((uint256,uint25.details: This function creates new governance tokens for specified record

params.newTokenData: This contains all the parameters needed to create a new governance token that are
params.userAddress: - This is the address of the user who is the creator of the token

exists(uint256).details: Indicates whether any token exist with a given id, or not.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: This is to set the address of the contracts

params.controllerContractAddress: This is the address of Controller contract
params.crdTokenAddress: This is the address of CRD token contract
params.newTreasuryAddress: This is the address of new voting hub contract
params.newVotingHubContract: This is the address of new voting hub contract

isSymbolAvailable(string,string).details: This function checks if symbol are available or not

mintTokens(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: This function creats new community tokens for specified record

params.recordId: This is the id of the record to which the token belongs to
params.tokenAmount: This is the amount that is to be minted
params.tokenId: This is the id of the which is to be minted

onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.ids: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)
params.operator: The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.values: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.id: The ID of the token being transferred
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender)
params.value: The amount of tokens being transferred

totalSupply(uint256).details: Total amount of tokens in with a given id.

totalSupplyAt(uint256,uint256).details: Retrieves the total supply at the time `snapshotId` was created.

transferRewardAmount(address,uint256,uin.details: This function is called only by the voting contract once the voting ends

params.contributionId: this is the contribution id to which the user has won
params.recordId: This is the recordId to which the contribution belongs to
params.rewardCommunity: this is the amount of community token that needs to be transferred
params.rewardGovernance: this is the amount of Governance token that needs to be transferred

transferRewardTokens(uint256,uint256,add.details: this function is responsible for minting of new tokens for records

params.amount: the amount that is to be minted
params.receiver: Id this is the tokenId that is to minted
params.tokenId: Id this is the tokenId that is to minted

uri(uint256).details: See {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}. This implementation returns the same URI for *all* token types. It relies on the token type ID substitution mechanism https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata[defined in the EIP]. Clients calling this function must replace the `\{id\}` substring with the actual token type ID.
